body_html:
Hi guys, I have the following error while running TensorFlow Demo code.
"undefined symbol: cudnnCreate
Aborted (core dumped)"

I then reinstalled cuDNN v5 and even tried upgrade it to v5.1, Still couldn't fix it. Any ideas?
I current have CUDA 8.0 with cuDNN 5.1, Tesla k80

body:
Hi guys, I have the following error while running TensorFlow Demo code.
"undefined symbol: cudnnCreate
Aborted (core dumped)"

I then reinstalled cuDNN v5 and even tried upgrade it to v5.1, Still couldn't fix it. Any ideas?
I current have CUDA 8.0 with cuDNN 5.1, Tesla k80
